Dan Walters quotes state Treasurer Bill Lockyer , who argues that No state needs to declare bankruptcy. The states have sovereign taxing authority. Bill Lockyer , who has recently argued that the state merely suffers from a bad national economy and who downplays California's half-trillion-dollar pension debt, promotes one handy solution to everything: higher taxes. The announcement was made at the Sibos event in Amsterdam via a video link from Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology, says Steve Ballmer .`` No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand.'' Last night a source close to the X Factor host said: Cheryl considered going back to her maiden name but now she has dismissed the idea. People knew who she was as a Tweedy but she has only become truly famous as Cheryl Cole. yet but seeds have been sown by people like Black Eyed Peas singer Will.i.am and it is important she creates a lasting brand. It would be madness to change back. The Sunday Mirror can also confirm that Simon Cowell has promised her a job as a judge on the US X Factor. He has spent the past few days convincing American producers that she will be a huge success.
